summary: A lone gunfighter attempts to make a deal with a Mexican bandit to split a shipment of stolen gold, resulting in a brutal game of double-cross between the two parties.
cast: Tony Anthony|Jolanda Modio|Raf Baldassarre|Aldo Berti|Lars Bloch|Enrico Capoleoni|Arturo Corso|Antonio Marsina|Salvatore Puntillo|Fortunato Arena|Rossella Bergamonti|Ugo Carboni|Giovanni Ivan Scratuglia|Gia Sandri|Frank Wolff|Loris Bazzocchi|Nicola Di Gioia|Alberigo Donadeo|Angela Minervini
